summary: App to guide people with form filling, provide contact information, and offer learning content on making money online from home.
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Minimal flat logo mark of a clipboard with a checkmark and a small house icon, warm neutral + green accent (app-logo.dim_512x512.png)
- Wide hero illustration of a person working at home on a laptop with simple UI form elements floating nearby, warm neutral background with green/orange accents (hero-illustration.dim_1600x900.png)

existing_features.title: Create the core app navigation and pages for: (1) Guided Form Filling, (2) Contact & Support, and (3) Learn (make money online from home), with all user-facing text in English.

Implement a guided form-filling flow that helps users complete common online forms step-by-step, including: selecting a form type, showing required fields, providing tips/examples per field, and producing a final review screen before submission (no actual submission to third-party sites).
Provide a Contact & Support section that shows support contact information and a help request form (name, email, message) that stores requests in the backend.

Create a Learn section with structured educational content about making money online from home (articles/lessons), including categories, lesson detail pages, and clear disclaimers about avoiding scams and not guaranteeing income.
Apply a coherent visual theme across the app (colors, typography, spacing, and component styling) suitable for an educational/support experience; avoid blue/purple as primary colors.
Add generated static brand/illustration assets and use them in the UI (stored under frontend/public/assets/generated), including a simple logo and a hero illustration.

new_feature_requests.summary: Provide guided form-filling assistance for users
Include contact information / support contacts for users
Provide educational content on making money online from home

Implement Motoko backend data models and endpoints to support: (a) fetching form guidance templates, (b) fetching learning lessons and categories, and (c) creating and listing help requests. Persist this data in canister stable state.

projectName: Form-filling guidance app with contact info and work-from-home learning content
